title: Self-Contained Waterfront Apartment Getaway
description: Escape to the sparkling waterfront of the Coral Sea with a contemporary apartment stay in Bargara Beach, located on the southern fringe of the famed Great Barrier Reef. Located just across the road from the ocean, youâ€™ll enjoy a three, four or five-night, self-contained stay with a welcome bottle of sparkling wine and a guaranteed late checkout.
